title: Fumeshroom

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Produce a sun every night.
-Shoot your fume of spores at someone's house, dealing a Basic Attack. Costs 1 sun.
-Shoot your fume of spores at
someone's house, dealing a Powerful Rampage Attack. Costs 4 sun.
-Shoot your fume of spores at 4 people, dealing Powerful Attack. Costs  5 sun.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Your Basic Attack and Powerful Rampage Attack bypass all immunities such as healing and basic defense immunity. However, your Basic Attack wont go through Powerful and higher defense, and your Powerful Rampage Attack wont go through Invincible and higher defense. This does not apply to the Powerful attack you deal to 4 people.

desc:
Post 463
*Good for dealing with zombies holding a sturdy metal door.*
